workflow.name: Get Legal Entities
workflow.description: Use perplexity to get legal entity name

tasks.name: Search
tasks.instructions: The first name in the input is the name of a PE firm. The second name in the input is its portfolio company. Use perplexity search to find the most-likely legal entity name this company files Department of Labor documents under. It could be a parent company, or it could be a different name entirely. Return ONLY the likely legal name. If you aren't sure of the legal name, just use whatever you found that is most likely it. Like this: MEDIX STAFFING, LLC.
